flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=500000>>500000 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 500000 / 4 = <<500000/4=152000>>152000 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 500000 - 152000 = <<500000-152000=348000>>348000 tokens more than any of her siblings.
#### 348000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125000, not 152000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
